about_the_game:
Zomb Zerro 999 - VR Horror Experience

Explore the mountain base, kill creatures, solve puzzles and... stay alive. Otherwise, your mission will fail and the consequences of the experiment will spread everywhere.

Plot

As special Agent Sam, your job is to find out what happened at the Ground Rock base. Pay attention to clues, read notes left here and there by scientists, security guards or administrative staff. They may help you understand what went so terribly wrong. 

You also have to make sure that the haunting creatures cannot leave the base. Maybe it's necessary to destroy the entire complex?

Features

  • Fight with weapons, fists or tools from the envirnoment

  • Completely physical - grab almost anything you can think of

  • Handle ressources for weapons, magazines, flashlights, batteries etc.

  • Quickselect menu

  • Autosave

  • Sitting Mode

  • Settings: General, Audio, Graphics, Language

  • Movement: walk / sprint / jump / climb

  • Switch between smooth- and snapturn

  • Unsettling and disturbing atmosphere

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence againes creatures, including blood and blood splatters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, OpenXR, Oculus and Meta
  • Additional Notes: Requires motion controllers
